Policyholder: SHEILA LANUZA REAL
Insurance Company: ORIENT INSURANCE
Policy #: P/01/1306/2018/11725/7
Inception Date: 22/02/2025
Expiry Date: 21/02/2026 
Number of Insured: 1

Please find below the documents attached herewith for your records: 

1.	 E-card copies – Will follow
2.	Insurance Certificate
3.	 Schedule of Benefits
4.	 Policy Contract Wording
5.	 Nasco Claims Guide
6.	 Network List 
7.	 Mobile App Guide
8.	 Tax Invoice issued by insurer
9.	 Receipt Copy

Important Note: This policy is card-less, and you will not be receiving a plastic card. Instead, each member covered under the policy can use their Emirates ID as a substitute for the health insurance card. When visiting medical facilities/providers within the network, it is essential to identify yourself as insured with ORIENT INSURANCE. Present your Emirates ID or provide a copy of the e-card to verify your health insurance coverage. Please refer to the attached list of networks for your easy reference.

To enhance your experience and streamline access to your health insurance policy details, we highly encourage you to download the mobile app. The mobile app is designed to simplify your interactions with services, providing a user-friendly platform for managing your health insurance needs.

We eagerly anticipate a fruitful partnership throughout the year. At NASCO, we are dedicated to providing excellent service. Should you encounter any dissatisfaction, discrepancies, or have any complaints, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Dear Mr. Yasir, 

We thank you for entrusting NASCO with the placement of your health insurance policy. 

We are pleased to confirm that the policy has been issued and activated. 
Please note the details of the policy as follows: 

Policyholder: SHEILA LANUZA REAL
Insurance Company: ORIENT INSURANCE
Policy #: P/01/1306/2018/11725/7
Inception Date: 22/02/2025
Expiry Date: 21/02/2026 
Number of Insured: 1

Please find below the documents attached herewith for your records: 

1.	 E-card copies – Will follow
2.	Insurance Certificate
3.	 Schedule of Benefits
4.	 Policy Contract Wording
5.	 Nasco Claims Guide
6.	 Network List 
7.	 Mobile App Guide
8.	 Tax Invoice issued by insurer
9.	 Receipt Copy

Important Note: This policy is card-less, and you will not be receiving a plastic card. Instead, each member covered under the policy can use their Emirates ID as a substitute for the health insurance card. When visiting medical facilities/providers within the network, it is essential to identify yourself as insured with ORIENT INSURANCE. Present your Emirates ID or provide a copy of the e-card to verify your health insurance coverage. Please refer to the attached list of networks for your easy reference.

Dear Mr. Yasir, 

We thank you for entrusting NASCO with the placement of your health insurance policy. 

We are pleased to confirm that the policy has been issued and activated. 
Please note the details of the policy as follows: 

Policyholder: SHEILA LANUZA REAL
Insurance Company: ORIENT INSURANCE
Policy #: P/01/1306/2018/11725/7
Inception Date: 22/02/2025
Expiry Date: 21/02/2026 
Number of Insured: 1

Please find below the documents attached herewith for your records: 

1.	 E-card copies – Will follow
2.	Insurance Certificate
3.	 Schedule of Benefits
4.	 Policy Contract Wording
5.	 Nasco Claims Guide
6.	 Network List 
7.	 Mobile App Guide
8.	 Tax Invoice issued by insurer
9.	 Receipt Copy

Important Note: This policy is card-less, and you will not be receiving a plastic card. Instead, each member covered under the policy can use their Emirates ID as a substitute for the health insurance card. When visiting medical facilities/providers within the network, it is essential to identify yourself as insured with ORIENT INSURANCE. Present your Emirates ID or provide a copy of the e-card to verify your health insurance coverage. Please refer to the attached list of networks for your easy reference.

Dear Mr. Yasir, 

We thank you for entrusting NASCO with the placement of your health insurance policy. 

We are pleased to confirm that the policy has been issued and activated. 
Please note the details of the policy as follows: 

Policyholder: SHEILA LANUZA REAL
Insurance Company: ORIENT INSURANCE
Policy #: P/01/1306/2018/11725/7
Inception Date: 22/02/2025
Expiry Date: 21/02/2026 
Number of Insured: 1

Please find below the documents attached herewith for your records: 

1.	 E-card copies – Will follow
2.	Insurance Certificate
3.	 Schedule of Benefits
4.	 Policy Contract Wording
5.	 Nasco Claims Guide
6.	 Network List 
7.	 Mobile App Guide
8.	 Tax Invoice issued by insurer
9.	 Receipt Copy

Important Note: This policy is card-less, and you will not be receiving a plastic card. Instead, each member covered under the policy can use their Emirates ID as a substitute for the health insurance card. When visiting medical facilities/providers within the network, it is essential to identify yourself as insured with ORIENT INSURANCE. Present your Emirates ID or provide a copy of the e-card to verify your health insurance coverage. Please refer to the attached list of networks for your easy reference.
